fields.name: check_config
fields.description: Check the Home Assistant configuration files for errors. Errors will be displayed in the Home Assistant log.

fields.name: reload_core_config
fields.description: Reload the core configuration.

fields.name: restart
fields.description: Restart the Home Assistant service. It is normal to get a "Failed to call service homeassistant/restart" message.

fields.name: stop
fields.description: Stop the Home Assistant service. It is normal to get a "Failed to call service homeassistant/stop" message.

fields.name: toggle
fields.description: Generic service to toggle devices on/off under any domain. Same usage as the light.turn_on, switch.turn_on, etc. services.

fields.name: turn_off
fields.description: Generic service to turn devices off under any domain. Same usage as the light.turn_on, switch.turn_on, etc. services.

fields.name: turn_on
fields.description: Generic service to turn devices on under any domain. Same usage as the light.turn_on, switch.turn_on, etc. services.

fields.name: create
fields.description: Show a notification in the frontend.

fields.name: dismiss
fields.description: Remove a notification from the frontend.

fields.name: publish
fields.description: Publish a message to an MQTT topic.

fields.name: purge
fields.description: Start purge task - delete events and states older than x days, according to keep_days service data.

fields.name: toggle
fields.description: Toggles an input boolean.

fields.name: turn_off
fields.description: Turns off an input boolean

fields.name: turn_on
fields.description: Turns on an input boolean.

fields.name: notify
fields.description: Send a notification.

fields.name: disable_motion_detection
fields.description: Disable the motion detection in a camera.

fields.name: enable_motion_detection
fields.description: Enable the motion detection in a camera.

fields.name: local_file_update_file_path
fields.description: Update the file_path for a local_file camera.

fields.name: snapshot
fields.description: Take a snapshot from a camera.

fields.name: turn_off
fields.description: Turn off camera.

fields.name: turn_on
fields.description: Turn on camera.

fields.name: set_aux_heat
fields.description: Turn auxiliary heater on/off for climate device.

fields.name: set_away_mode
fields.description: Turn away mode on/off for climate device.

fields.name: set_fan_mode
fields.description: Set fan operation for climate device.

fields.name: set_hold_mode
fields.description: Turn hold mode for climate device.

fields.name: set_humidity
fields.description: Set target humidity of climate device.

fields.name: set_operation_mode
fields.description: Set operation mode for climate device.

fields.name: set_swing_mode
fields.description: Set swing operation for climate device.

fields.name: set_temperature
fields.description: Set target temperature of climate device.

fields.name: turn_off
fields.description: Turn climate device off.

fields.name: turn_on
fields.description: Turn climate device on.

fields.name: reload
fields.description: Reload group configuration.

fields.name: remove
fields.description: Remove a user group.

fields.name: set
fields.description: Create/Update a user group.

fields.name: set_visibility
fields.description: Hide or show a group.

fields.name: reload
fields.description: Reload the automation configuration.

fields.name: toggle
fields.description: Toggle an automation.

fields.name: trigger
fields.description: Trigger the action of an automation.

fields.name: turn_off
fields.description: Disable an automation.

fields.name: turn_on
fields.description: Enable an automation.

fields.name: alarm_arm_away
fields.description: Send the alarm the command for arm away.

fields.name: alarm_arm_home
fields.description: Send the alarm the command for arm home.

fields.name: alarm_arm_night
fields.description: Send the alarm the command for arm night.

fields.name: alarm_disarm
fields.description: Send the alarm the command for disarm.

fields.name: alarm_trigger
fields.description: Send the alarm the command for trigger.

fields.name: envisalink_alarm_keypress
fields.description: Send custom keypresses to the alarm.

fields.name: clear_playlist
fields.description: Send the media player the command to clear players playlist.

fields.name: media_next_track
fields.description: Send the media player the command for next track.

fields.name: media_pause
fields.description: Send the media player the command for pause.

fields.name: media_play
fields.description: Send the media player the command for play.

fields.name: media_play_pause
fields.description: Toggle media player play/pause state.

fields.name: media_previous_track
fields.description: Send the media player the command for previous track.

fields.name: media_seek
fields.description: Send the media player the command to seek in current playing media.

fields.name: media_stop
fields.description: Send the media player the stop command.

fields.name: play_media
fields.description: Send the media player the command for playing media.

fields.name: select_sound_mode
fields.description: Send the media player the command to change sound mode.

fields.name: select_source
fields.description: Send the media player the command to change input source.

fields.name: shuffle_set
fields.description: Set shuffling state.

fields.name: toggle
fields.description: Toggles a media player power state.

fields.name: turn_off
fields.description: Turn a media player power off.

fields.name: turn_on
fields.description: Turn a media player power on.

fields.name: volume_down
fields.description: Turn a media player volume down.

fields.name: volume_mute
fields.description: Mute a media player's volume.

fields.name: volume_set
fields.description: Set a media player's volume level.

fields.name: volume_up
fields.description: Turn a media player volume up.

fields.name: toggle
fields.description: Toggles a switch state.

fields.name: turn_off
fields.description: Turn a switch off.

fields.name: turn_on
fields.description: Turn a switch on.

fields.name: see
fields.description: Control tracked device.

fields.name: clear_cache
fields.description: Remove cache files and RAM cache.

fields.name: toggle
fields.description: Toggles a light.

fields.name: turn_off
fields.description: Turn a light off.

fields.name: turn_on
fields.description: Turn a light on.

fields.name: clear_usercode
fields.description: Clear a usercode from lock.

fields.name: get_usercode
fields.description: Retrieve a usercode from lock.

fields.name: lock
fields.description: Lock all or specified locks.

fields.name: set_usercode
fields.description: Set a usercode to lock.

fields.name: unlock
fields.description: Unlock all or specified locks.

fields.name: add_node
fields.description: Add a new (unsecure) node to the Z-Wave network. Refer to OZW.log for progress.

fields.name: add_node_secure
fields.description: Add a new node to the Z-Wave network with secure communications. Secure network key must be set, this process will fallback to add_node (unsecure) for unsupported devices. Note that unsecure devices can't directly talk to secure devices. Refer to OZW.log for progress.

fields.name: cancel_command
fields.description: Cancel a running Z-Wave controller command. Use this to exit add_node, if you weren't going to use it but activated it.

fields.name: change_association
fields.description: Change an association in the Z-Wave network.

fields.name: heal_network
fields.description: Start a Z-Wave network heal. This might take a while and will slow down the Z-Wave network greatly while it is being processed. Refer to OZW.log for progress.

fields.name: heal_node
fields.description: Start a Z-Wave node heal. Refer to OZW.log for progress.

fields.name: print_config_parameter
fields.description: Prints a Z-Wave node config parameter value to log.

fields.name: print_node
fields.description: Print all information about z-wave node.

fields.name: refresh_entity
fields.description: Refresh zwave entity.

fields.name: refresh_node
fields.description: Refresh zwave node.

fields.name: remove_failed_node
fields.description: This command will remove a failed node from the network. The node should be on the controllers failed nodes list, otherwise this command will fail. Refer to OZW.log for progress.

fields.name: remove_node
fields.description: Remove a node from the Z-Wave network. Refer to OZW.log for progress.

fields.name: rename_node
fields.description: Set the name of a node. This will also affect the IDs of all entities in the node.

fields.name: rename_value
fields.description: Set the name of a node value. This will affect the ID of the value entity. Value IDs can be queried from /api/zwave/values/{node_id}

fields.name: replace_failed_node
fields.description: Replace a failed node with another. If the node is not in the controller's failed nodes list, or the node responds, this command will fail. Refer to OZW.log for progress.

fields.name: reset_node_meters
fields.description: Resets the meter counters of a node.

fields.name: set_config_parameter
fields.description: Set a config parameter to a node on the Z-Wave network.

fields.name: set_poll_intensity
fields.description: Set the polling interval to a nodes value

fields.name: set_wakeup
fields.description: Sets wake-up interval of a node.

fields.name: soft_reset
fields.description: This will reset the controller without removing its data. Use carefully because not all controllers support this. Refer to controllers manual.

fields.name: start_network
fields.description: Start the Z-Wave network. This might take a while, depending on how big your Z-Wave network is.

fields.name: stop_network
fields.description: Stop the Z-Wave network, all updates into HASS will stop.

fields.name: test_network
fields.description: This will send test to nodes in the Z-Wave network. This will greatly slow down the Z-Wave network while it is being processed. Refer to OZW.log for progress.

fields.name: test_node
fields.description: This will send test messages to a node in the Z-Wave network. This could bring back dead nodes.

fields.name: update_config
fields.description: Attempt to update ozw configuration files from git to support newer devices.
